description.english: Reached the bottom of The Cave.
description.german: Du bist bis in die tiefste Tiefe der Höhle vorgedrungen.
description.french: A atteint le fond de la Caverne.
description.italian: Hai toccato il fondo della Caverna.
description.spanish: Has llegado a lo más profundo de La Cueva.
description.japanese: 洞窟の最深部へたどり着く

description.english: Got everyone out of The Cave without dying once.
description.german: Alle Charaktere sind der Höhle entkommen, und keiner ist draufgegangen.
description.french: A fait sortir tout le monde indemne de la Caverne.
description.italian: Hai fatto uscire tutti dalla Caverna senza che nessuno sia morto, nemmeno una volta.
description.spanish: Has sacado a todo el mundo de La Cueva sin que nadie muera.
description.japanese: 誰も一度も死なずに洞窟から出る

description.english: Saw a postcard stolen from the Gift Shop.
description.german: Du hast eine Postkarte aus dem Souvenirladen geklaut.
description.french: A volé une carte de la Boutique de souvenirs.
description.italian: Hai rubato una cartolina dal negozio di souvenir.
description.spanish: Has robado una postal de la tienda de regalos.
description.japanese: みやげ屋からポストカードが盗まれる場面を目撃する

description.english: Remembered it's wrong to steal.
description.german: Dir fällt ein, dass Klauen schlecht ist.
description.french: Se souvenir que voler, c'est mal.
description.italian: Ricordati che rubare è sbagliato.
description.spanish: Recuerda que robar no está bien.
description.japanese: ポストカードがみやげ屋に返却される場面を目撃した

description.english: Everyone reached the bottom.
description.german: Alle Charaktere schaffen es nach unten.
description.french: Tout le monde doit atteindre le fond.
description.italian: Tutti i personaggi devono toccare il fondo.
description.spanish: Que lleguen todos a lo más profundo.
description.japanese: 全員が洞窟の最深部へたどり着いた

description.english: Saw the good in everyone.
description.german: Das Gute steckt in jedem.
description.french: Voir le bon côté de chacun.
description.italian: Trova il buono in ognuno di noi.
description.spanish: Puedes ver el bien en todos ellos.
description.japanese: 皆の良い面を見た

description.english: Saw the darkness in all our hearts.
description.german: Dunkelheit steckt in unser aller Herzen.
description.french: Voir le mauvais côté de chacun.
description.italian: Trova il male che c'è nei nostri cuori.
description.spanish: Observa la maldad en todos sus corazones.
description.japanese: 皆の心に潜む闇を見た

description.english: Collector of forgotten dreams.
description.german: Sammler vergessener Träume.
description.french: Collectionneur des rêves perdus.
description.italian: Colleziona sogni dimenticati.
description.spanish: Coleccionista de los sueños olvidados.
description.japanese: 忘れられた夢を集めた

description.english: Sacrificed oneself for ultimate flavor.
description.german: Du opferst dich im Namen des ultimativen Geschmacks.
description.french: Se sacrifier par amour pour la gastronomie.
description.italian: Sacrificati per il bene dell'alta cucina.
description.spanish: Sacrifícate en pos del buen sabor.
description.japanese: 自らを犠牲にし、究極の味を完成させた

description.english: Where did the King go anyway?
description.german: Wo ist eigentlich der König hin?
description.french: Mais où est donc passé le Roi ?
description.italian: Dov'è andato a finire il Re?
description.spanish: ¿Adónde se ha ido el rey?
description.japanese: ところで、王様はどこへ行ったのかな？

description.english: The scale reveals a baleful figure.
description.german: Die Waage zeigt eine unheilvolle Zahl.
description.french: La balance révèle un nombre sinistre.
description.italian: La bilancia mostra una cifra inquietante.
description.spanish: La balanza revela un símbolo maligno.
description.japanese: 体重計が不吉な数字を出した

description.english: 3 die by the Miner's hand.
description.german: Drei sterben durch die Hand des Minenarbeiters.
description.french: 3 morts à cause du mineur.
description.italian: I tre personaggi muoiono per colpa del Minatore.
description.spanish: Tres mueren a manos del minero.
description.japanese: 鉱員の手で3人が同時に死亡した

description.english: Pantomimed an ancient hieroglyph.
description.german: Du stellst antike Hieroglyphen nach.
description.french: Mimer un hiéroglyphe.
description.italian: Mima un geroglifico antico.
description.spanish: Imita un jeroglífico antiguo.
description.japanese: 象形文字のマネをした

description.english: Watched Mummy and Daddy's furniture get broken all to bits.
description.german: Du hast Mamas und Papas Möbel ruiniert.
description.french: Ont cassé les meubles de papa et maman.
description.italian: Rompi delle cose.
description.spanish: Has roto los muebles de papá y mamá.
description.japanese: ママとパパの家具が破壊される場面を目撃する

description.english: Made all three characters smell like a dinosaur at once.
description.german: Du hast es fertiggebracht, dass alle 3 Charaktere gleichzeitig nach Dino stinken.
description.french: Tous les personnages ont senti le dinosaure en même temps.
description.italian: Hai fatto in modo che tutti e tre i personaggi puzzassero come un dinosauro.
description.spanish: Has conseguido que los tres personajes huelan como un auténtico dinosaurio.
description.japanese: 3人を同時に恐竜の体臭にする

description.english: Recorded and played back the elevator music from the Zoo food court.
description.german: Musik aus dem Lautsprecher des Zoos aufgenommen und abgespielt.
description.french: A enregistré et joué la musique de la zone détente du zoo.
description.italian: Hai registrato e riprodotto la musica della zona relax dello Zoo.
description.spanish: Has grabado y reproducido la música de ascensor de la zona de descanso del zoo.
description.japanese: 動物園のフードコートで音楽を録音し、再生する

description.english: Slipped, where wet.
description.german: Vorsicht Rutschgefahr!
description.french: Sol glissant.
description.italian: Scivola sul pavimento scivoloso.
description.spanish: ¡Cuidado! Suelo mojado.
description.japanese: 濡れている場所は滑るので注意！

description.english: Broke bridges.
description.german: Du bringst Brücken zum Einsturz.
description.french: Ponts cassés.
description.italian: Fai crollare i ponti.
description.spanish: El "Rompe puentes" te llaman.
description.japanese: 橋を破壊した

description.english: Food-based destruction.
description.german: Nahrungsbasierte Zerstörung.
description.french: Destruction alimentaire.
description.italian: Distruzione a base di cibo.
description.spanish: Destrucción alimentaria.
description.japanese: 食料破壊兵器

displayName.english: Don't Fill Up On Fortune Cookies
displayName.spanish: Deja las galletas de la suerte
displayName.japanese: 記念におみくじはいかが？

description.english: Peered into everyone's fate.
description.german: Du schaust in die Zukunft Aller.
description.french: Apercevoir l'avenir de chacun.
description.italian: Sbircia nel destino di tutti i personaggi.
description.spanish: Entérate del destino de todos y cada uno.
description.japanese: 皆の命運をのぞき見した

displayName.spanish: El robo de una noche de verano

description.english: Helped the Knight obtain Excalibur.
description.german: Du hast Excalibur!
description.french: A obtenu Excalibur.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto Excalibur.
description.spanish: Has obtenido la espada Excalibur.
description.japanese: 騎士がエクスカリバーを獲得するのを手伝う

displayName.japanese: バーニングカーニバル

description.english: Enabled the Hillbilly to burn down the Carnival.
description.german: Du hast den Jahrmarkt niedergebrannt.
description.french: A mis le feu à la fête foraine.
description.italian: Hai bruciato il Luna Park.
description.spanish: Has quemado la feria.
description.japanese: 村人がカーニバルを焼き払うのを手伝う

description.english: Came ever-so-close to recovering the Sarcophagus.
description.german: Du warst so nah dran, den Sarkophag zu bergen!
description.french: A manqué de peu de récupérer le sarcophage.
description.italian: Sei andato vicinissimo al recupero del sarcofago.
description.spanish: Te has quedado a muy poco de recuperar el sarcófago.
description.japanese: 王棺を回収......できると思ったらできなかった場面まで進む

displayName.japanese: 皆に神の祝福がありますように

description.english: Stood by and watched as the Twins murdered their parents.
description.german: Du hast deine Eltern abgemurkst.
description.french: A assassiné les parents.
description.italian: Hai ucciso i tuoi genitori.
description.spanish: Has asesinado a tus padres.
description.japanese: 双子が両親を殺害する場面を目撃する

description.english: Served as an accessory to the Time Traveler's murder of her enemy's ancestor.
description.german: Du hast den Vorfahren deines Feindes umgebracht.
description.french: A assassiné l'ancêtre de son ennemi.
description.italian: Hai ucciso l'antenato del tuo nemico.
description.spanish: Has asesinado al antepasado de tu peor enemigo.
description.japanese: タイムトラベラーがライバルの先祖を殺害するのを手伝う

displayName.japanese: 発射しちゃったもんはしょうがない

description.english: Shared in the blame for the Scientist's act of mass murder.
description.german: Du hast Millionen umgebracht.
description.french: A assassiné des millions de personnes.
description.italian: Hai ucciso milioni di persone.
description.spanish: Has asesinado a millones.
description.japanese: 科学者がミサイルを発射するのを手伝う

description.english: Played some dubious role in the Monk's murder of his Master.
description.german: Du hast deinen Meister um die Ecke gebracht.
description.french: A assassiné son maître.
description.italian: Hai ucciso il tuo maestro.
description.spanish: Has asesinado a tu maestro.
description.japanese: 僧侶が師匠を殺害するのを手伝う
